attrs.value:
To expand your search, use the wildcard character '%' to 
 represent any letter in your search. 

 For example, typing 'MIC%' would return all names 
 starting with MIC or typing '%MIC%' would return a 
 name where 'MIC' is contained anywhere in the name.
